amendment.description: Amendment requires that funds made available for Army procurement of munitions must be expended in full compliance with the Competition in Contracting Act.
amendment.purpose: An amendment printed in the Congressional Record of September 6 as amendment No. 80, to require all procurement of munitions procurement to comply with the Competition in Contracting Act.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Burton amendment (A010) Agreed to by voice vote.
